REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0469 reute b f BC-AMERICAN-MOTORS-<AMO> 03-11 0064

TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN MOTORS <AMO> WEIGHS TAKEOVER PROPOSAL
TEXT.BODY: American Motors Corp said its directors met Wednesday to review the takeover proposal which the corporation received Monday from Chrysler Corp <C>. AMC said its board has retained independent investment and legal advisers and expects to meet periodically over the next several weeks on the proposal. Reuter
